package com.entity;

public class Bottomrukudata {
private String bono;
private String amount;
private String boname;
public Bottomrukudata(String bono, String amount, String boname) {
	super();
	this.bono = bono;
	this.amount = amount;
	this.boname = boname;
}
public Bottomrukudata() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}
public String getBono() {
	return bono;
}
public void setBono(String bono) {
	this.bono = bono;
}
public String getAmount() {
	return amount;
}
public void setAmount(String amount) {
	this.amount = amount;
}
public String getBoname() {
	return boname;
}
public void setBoname(String boname) {
	this.boname = boname;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Bottom_ind_ruku [bono=" + bono + ", amount=" + amount + ", boname="
			+ boname + "]";
}

}


package com.dao.show;

import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

import org.apache.commons.dbutils.QueryRunner;
import org.apache.commons.dbutils.handlers.BeanListHandler;
import com.entity.Bottomrukudata;
import com.util.JdbcUtil;

public class ShowBottomrukuDaoImpl implements ShowBottomrukuDao {

	public List<Bottomrukudata> showData(String tablename) {
		try {
			QueryRunner qr = new QueryRunner(JdbcUtil.getDataSource());
			String sql = "SELECT * FROM "+tablename+" ";
			return (List<Bottomrukudata>)qr.query(sql, new BeanListHandler(Bottomrukudata.class));
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new RuntimeException(e);
		}
	}

}


package com.service.show;

import java.util.List;


import com.dao.show.ShowBottomrukuDao;
import com.dao.show.ShowBottomrukuDaoImpl;

import com.entity.Bottomrukudata;

public class ShowBottomrukuServiceImpl implements ShowBottomrukuService {

	ShowBottomrukuDao dao = new ShowBottomrukuDaoImpl();
	public List<Bottomrukudata> showData(String tablename) {	
		System.out.println(dao.showData(tablename));
		return dao.showData(tablename);
	}

}


package com.web.show;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.List;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

import com.entity.Bottomdata;
import com.entity.Bottomrukudata;
import com.service.show.ShowBottomService;
import com.service.show.ShowBottomServiceImpl;
import com.service.show.ShowBottomrukuService;
import com.service.show.ShowBottomrukuServiceImpl;

public class ShowBottomrukuServlet extends HttpServlet {
	public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {

		request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
		// 数据封装
	
		
		//将用户输入的数据封装到aquery
		//aquery = WebUtil.copyRequestToBean(request, AdminQuery.class);
		// 请求头用于防止非法链接
		String referer = request.getHeader("referer");
		String tablename = request.getParameter("tablename");
		
		// 获取用输入的数据
		String currentPage = request.getParameter("currentPage");
		if (currentPage == null || currentPage.equals("")) {
			// 如果用户第一次访问，没有传递currentPage参数，则当前页为1
			currentPage = "1";
		}

		String pageSize = request.getParameter("pageSize");
		if (pageSize == null || pageSize.equals("")) {
			pageSize = "5";
		}
		ShowBottomrukuService service = new ShowBottomrukuServiceImpl();
		List<Bottomrukudata> borlist = service.showData(tablename);
		System.out.println(borlist);
		//request.setAttribute("pageBean", pageBean);
		request.setAttribute("borlist", borlist);
		request.getRequestDispatcher("/jsp/bottomruku.jsp").forward(request, response);	

			
	}

	

	public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
			throws ServletException, IOException {
		doGet(request, response);

	}
}
